text: __NOTOC__ Year 243 (CCXLIII) was a common year starting on Sunday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Battle of Resaena: A Roman army under Timesitheus defeats the Persians at Resaena (Syria). King Shapur I must run away to the Euphrates. * Timesitheus becomes ill and dies under suspicious circumstances. Shapur I goes back to Persia. * Emperor Gordian III picks Philip the Arab as his new praetorian prefect. == Births == * Sun Liang, emperor of the Chinese Kingdom of Wu (d. 260) == Deaths == * Gu Yong, minister of Wu (b. 168) * Kan Ze, advisor of Wu * Timesitheus, advisor and praetorian prefect (b. 190) Category:240s
